Package jparsec.io.device

Classes that designs the driver interfaces to control astronomical hardware, and also implements them with virtual devices.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GenericCamera
    An interface for the commands that should be available to all cameras.
    GenericDome
    An interface for the commands that should be available to all domes.
    GenericTelescope
    An interface for the commands that should be available to all telescopes.
    GenericWeatherStation
    An interface for the commands that should be available to all weather stations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ObservationManager
    A class to organize the observations in different folders, reduce them, and optionally execute observations in a completely automatic way.
    SerialConnection
    A class to handle communications with a serial connection.
    TelescopeControlPanel
    A control panel to send/receive commands from the telescope.
    VirtualCamera
    An implementation of the camera interface for virtual cameras.
    VirtualDome
    An implementation of the dome interface for virtual domes.
    VirtualTelescope
    An implementation of a virtual telescope.
    VirtualWeatherStation
    An implementation of a weather station for testing purposes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GenericCamera.CAMERA_MODEL
    The set of camera models supported.
    GenericCamera.FILTER
    The set of filters supported.
    GenericCamera.IMAGE_ID
    The set of image types supported.
    GenericDome.DOME_MODEL
    The set of dome models supported.
    GenericTelescope.FOCUS_DIRECTION
    Focus direction values.
    GenericTelescope.FOCUS_SPEED
    Focus speed values.
    GenericTelescope.MOUNT
    Mount types.
    GenericTelescope.MOVE_DIRECTION
    Slew direction values, in equatorial or azimuthal depending on how the scope is mounted.
    GenericTelescope.MOVE_SPEED
    Slew rates values.
    GenericTelescope.TELESCOPE_MODEL
    The set of telescope models supported.
    GenericTelescope.TELESCOPE_TYPE
    The set of telescope types.
    GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_FORECAST
    The set of possible weather forecast values.
    GenericWeatherStation.WEATHER_STATION_MODEL
    The set of weather stations supported.
    ObservationManager.AVERAGE_METHOD
    The different possible methods to obtain the intensity in a given position in the output image given a set of intensities interpolated from the stacked images.
    ObservationManager.AVERAGE_NORMALIZATION
    The different possible methods to obtain the intensity in a given position in the output image given a set of intensities interpolated from the stacked images.
    ObservationManager.COMBINATION_METHOD
    Combination methods for individual flat/dark frames.
    ObservationManager.DRIZZLE
    Drizzle modes for better output image quality.
    ObservationManager.IMAGE_ORIENTATION
    The set of possible image orientations.
    ObservationManager.INTERPOLATION
    The different possible interpolation methods to resample images during the stacking process.

Package jparsec.io.device Description

Classes that designs the driver interfaces to control astronomical hardware, and also implements them with virtual devices.

This package contains the driver interfaces to different astronomical devices like telescopes, cameras, domes, or weather stations. It also provides implementations for 'virtual' devices that can be used for testing in the telescope control panel.
